definition: A visual representation or design associated with a specific festive occasion celebrated towards the end of the year, often depicting traditional symbols and themes related to this holiday season. It is commonly utilized in various forms of artistic expression, such as decorations, greeting cards, and advertisements, to evoke a sense of joy and festivity during this particular time of year.
